statements: SELECT * FROM SecurityBreachForensics;
SELECT breach_id, breach_type FROM SecurityBreachForensics;
SELECT * FROM SecurityBreachForensics WHERE investigation_status = 'Ongoing';
SELECT breach_date, affected_records FROM SecurityBreachForensics ORDER BY breach_date DESC;
SELECT breach_id, breach_type, investigation_status FROM SecurityBreachForensics WHERE affected_records > 1000;
SELECT breach_id, breach_date, breach_type FROM SecurityBreachForensics;
SELECT * FROM SecurityBreachForensics WHERE breach_type = 'Phishing';
SELECT breach_id, breach_date, affected_records FROM SecurityBreachForensics ORDER BY breach_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(affected_records) as avg_records FROM SecurityBreachForensics WHERE investigation_status = 'Ongoing';
SELECT breach_type, COUNT(*) as total_breaches FROM SecurityBreachForensics GROUP BY breach_type HAVING total_breaches > 1;
SELECT id, breach_date, breach_type, affected_systems, breach_description FROM SecurityBreachForensics;
SELECT investigation_id, investigator_name, investigation_notes, investigation_status FROM BreachInvestigation;
SELECT id, breach_type, breach_date, breach_description, affected_systems FROM SecurityBreachForensics;
SELECT investigator_name, investigation_status, investigation_notes, investigation_id FROM BreachInvestigation;
SELECT breach_type, breach_date, affected_systems, breach_description, id FROM SecurityBreachForensics;
SELECT * FROM SecurityBreachForensics;
SELECT id, breach_date, breach_type FROM SecurityBreachForensics WHERE breach_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT * FROM SecurityBreachForensics WHERE breach_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY breach_date DESC;
SELECT investigation_id, investigator_name, investigation_notes FROM BreachInvestigation WHERE investigation_status = 'Ongoing';
SELECT S.id, S.breach_type, B.investigator_name FROM SecurityBreachForensics S JOIN BreachInvestigation B ON S.id = B.breach_id;
SELECT * FROM SecurityBreachRecords
SELECT event_type, description, date FROM SecurityBreachRecords WHERE id = 1
SELECT id, username, timestamp FROM UserActivityLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT report, investigator, date_generated FROM ForensicReports WHERE investigator = 'John Doe'
SELECT id, action, user_id FROM UserActivityLogs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, date, event_type, description FROM SecurityBreachRecords WHERE id = 1
SELECT username, timestamp, action FROM UserActivityLogs WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT investigator, date_generated, report FROM ForensicReports WHERE date_generated BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY date_generated ASC
SELECT id, event_type, description FROM SecurityBreachRecords WHERE event_type LIKE '%data breach%' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM UserActivityLogs JOIN SecurityBreachRecords ON UserActivityLogs.user_id = SecurityBreachRecords.id WHERE UserActivityLogs.action = 'LOGIN' ORDER BY UserActivityLogs.timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM breaching_events WHERE event_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT event_date, event_type, summary FROM breaching_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT suspect_name FROM suspects WHERE alias = 'Anonymous';
SELECT event_id, event_type, summary FROM breaching_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM investigation_reports WHERE findings LIKE '%sensitive information%';
SELECT * FROM breaching_events;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_type FROM breaching_events WHERE event_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT COUNT(event_id) AS total_events FROM breaching_events;
SELECT suspects.suspect_name, evidence_collection.evidence_type FROM suspects LEFT JOIN evidence_collection ON suspects.evidence_id = evidence_collection.evidence_id;

SELECT investigation_reports.report_date, investigation_reports.findings FROM investigation_reports JOIN breaching_events ON investigation_reports.event_id = breaching_events.event_id ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM breaches WHERE id = 1;
SELECT affected_entity, description FROM breaches WHERE date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM attackers WHERE organization = 'Anonymous';
SELECT name, organization FROM attackers WHERE id = 2;
SELECT method_name, description FROM hacking_methods WHERE complexity > 3;
SELECT * FROM breaches WHERE description LIKE '%data breach%' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, name, organization FROM attackers WHERE organization = 'Anonymous';
SELECT method_name, complexity FROM hacking_methods WHERE complexity > 5 ORDER BY complexity DESC;
SELECT b.id, a.name, h.method_name FROM breach_details bd JOIN breaches b ON bd.breach_id = b.id JOIN attackers a ON bd.attacker_id = a.id JOIN hacking_methods h ON bd.method_id = h.id;
SELECT id, result FROM investigations WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
